unnormalised: Oh man, planning my sister's wedding is proving to be a nightmare! Initially, we had the engagement fixed for 22/12/2024, but then her fiance's family wanted to prepone it to 15/12/2024. Now, the actual wedding date is set for 05/02/2025, but the reception hall only had slots at 7:30 PM. And to top it all off, my aunt keeps reminding me that shubh muhurat is at 11:45 AM according to the Pandit ji! I need a vacation after this, seriously. Maybe a trip to Goa starting 08/02/2025?
normalised: Oh man, planning my sister's wedding is proving to be a nightmare! Initially, we had the engagement fixed for twenty second december two thousand and twenty four, but then her fiance's family wanted to prepone it to fifteenth december two thousand and twenty four. Now, the actual wedding date is set for fifth february two thousand and twenty five, but the reception hall only had slots at seven thirty P.M. And to top it all off, my aunt keeps reminding me that shubh muhurat is at eleven forty five A.M. according to the Pandit ji! I need a vacation after this, seriously. Maybe a trip to Goa starting eighth february two thousand and twenty five?
